content: How can I create a cladogram using Latex to represent the evolutionary history and relationships of living organisms? Can you explain the concept of cladistics and its relationship to taxonomy and classification? How does cladistics differ from traditional methods of classification based on characteristics alone? What are the benefits and limitations of using cladistics in biological research and classification? Can you provide an example of a cladogram and how it illustrates the evolutionary relationships among organisms? Please include HTML code to display the cladogram on a webpage.
